title: How to Delete Your eBay Purchase History

steps.headline: Navigate to your Purchase History page.
steps.description: If you're using a web browser, go to https://www.ebay.com and sign in. Hover the mouse cursor over My eBay at the top-right corner of the page, then click Purchase History. If you're using the mobile app, open the app, sign in, and navigate to Purchase History from the account menu.

steps.headline: Click More Actions next to the item you want to hide.
steps.description: You'll see this text under the receipt button on the right side of the page. A menu will expand. If you're using the mobile app, tap an item in your purchase history to see more options, then tap More Actions.

steps.headline: Click Hide Order on the menu.
steps.description: The item is now hidden from your purchase history. You can see the order by selecting Show Hidden Items at the top of the page.

text: Navigate to your Purchase History page. If you're using a web browser, go to https://www.ebay.com and sign in. Hover the mouse cursor over My eBay at the top-right corner of the page, then click Purchase History. If you're using the mobile app, open the app, sign in, and navigate to Purchase History from the account menu. Click More Actions next to the item you want to hide. You'll see this text under the receipt button on the right side of the page. A menu will expand. If you're using the mobile app, tap an item in your purchase history to see more options, then tap More Actions. Click Hide Order on the menu. The item is now hidden from your purchase history. You can see the order by selecting Show Hidden Items at the top of the page.
